messages: You have a strange dream about winged snakes.
Your dreams give you a strange scorching feeling.
You dream of a fire.  Whole dream is just about the fire.
You are at the camping, in the middle of the camp as a bonfire… what?
You wonder why it is so hard to fly with your wings… wait, wings?
You dream of a typical Knight-and-Dragon fabel, but you are the dragon.
You think it is a bad idea to fly during a thunderstorm and decide to stay home and lit a fireplace with your breath. Just a breath?

//3: The freezing wind knocks you down into the snow.  You are exhausted, sinking deeper into the sea of snow, choking.  So cold.  so… terrible nightmare.
messages: You dream of the cataclysm, flying over a burning city.  The fire illuminates the sky and warms the air.  It's so cozy, like you are home.
You dream of a glorious fight, as it abruptly becomes a nightmare as your armor CRAACKS… a shivering cold rushes through your body.
You dream of a burned ruins you left behind after a successful raid.
You dream of breathing plasma, burning through the hardest armor possible.
You dream of teaching cavemen to lit a fire.
You dream of becoming a dragon.  Wait, you are one already…
You are the flame in a shape of a dragon, spreading across every itch of the dream…
